purpose: Facilitates the creation and integration of OpenAI-compatible plugins across various applications and platforms.
principle: Builds on a plugin architecture allowing seamless integration of AI capabilities into different environments without being tied to a specific UI.
reusability: Highly composable with support for multiple plugins, easily integrated into existing systems via API.
limitations: Alpha status may imply limited stability and incomplete feature set; primarily supports Python environments.
name: pipelines
description: Pipelines: Versatile, UI-Agnostic OpenAI-Compatible Plugin Framework
highlight: Versatile, UI-agnostic framework for integrating OpenAI-compatible plugins
